dcterms:description: The IoT Intrusion Dataset consists of 42 raw network packet files (pcap) captured at different time points, generated by IoT devices such as SKT NUGU and EZVIZ Wi-Fi camera. The dataset includes network traffic data used for training and testing an intrusion detection system.
dcterms:title: IoT Intrusion Dataset
